EmailTemplate.name: CR 14b Graduation Timetables
EmailTemplate.subject: Your timetables for NCS: Graduation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team. ear {!Contact.FirstName}
NCS: Graduation timetables
Thank you for all your hard work with us so far; it has been another great year for the NCS with The Challenge summer programme.
We are coming close to the final parts of the programme and in October you will be seeing your team of young people through to the finish line at their Graduation.
Please login to the Staffing Website to view your timetables and further information for NCS: Graduation.
Click here to go the Staffing Website https://staffing.the-challenge.org
If you have any questions about your timetable for NCS: Graduation please contact your Staffing Associate.
Have a great time! Best Wishes,
NCS with The Challenge
Follow us on Twitter and Facebook
CR 14.1b
